scripts.template: mustache ../../../config/$NETWORK.js subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ../../../config/$NETWORK.js utils/constants.template.ts > utils/constants.ts && mustache ../../../config/$NETWORK.js utils/pricing.template.ts > utils/pricing.ts
scripts.deploy:goerli: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ cadinu/exchange-v3-goerli subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:chapel: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ cadinu/exchange-v3-chapel subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:eth: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ cadinu/exchange-v3-eth subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:bsc: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ m-ali-manouchehri/v3-subgraph-bsc subgraph.yaml
